Question: Is Amazon EBS encryption available on M3 instances?
Answer_True: Amazon EBS encryption is available on all current generation instance types and the following previous generation instance types: C3 cr1.8xlarge G2 I2 M3 and R3

Question: Does AMI supports tagging on creation?
Can I use my own keys in AWS KMS to encrypt data in Amazon Forecast?
Answer_True: Use one of your own AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) symmetric keys to encrypt Forecast data in your Amazon S3 buckets
